Text: These are really great quality. The expanded universe seems like they might be good reads. I am  definitely interested in The Last Command. I want to test out this trilogy before I look into other books. Thanks.
Wow! I've just finished it and had to register to ask for more!!! Thanks for this one!
I've uploaded the last book (The Last Command) here: http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8205869
Just a comment on the extended universe. There is a lot out there, but not much of it is as good quality literature as this trilogy, so don't get your hopes too high.
